cit.ini how to
[HOWTO] 

	we stored many information in /etc/cit.ini:
	Version:
		usb scan
		rootfs
		kernel
		application
		hardware
	Serial Number:
		SN
		
	cit.ini example:

	[version]
        rootfs = 1.0				; rootfs,changed when cramfs changed
        app   = 1.2.0 build 463 Nov 13 2009	; read from /cit200/sys.so
        usb_scan  =  1.0			; read from /proc/driver/scanner, The version changed when usb datapipe driver upgrade
        kernel = 2.6.27.2 (#V257)		; read from /proc/version, The version changed when kernel upgrade
        hardware = NL				; Hardware version which set in factory
	[serial number]
        sn = 					; read from /dev/mtdblock/6

CHINA. FuJian Newland Computer CO., Ltd
